name: Free Play Florida
description:
Free Play Florida is an annual three day celebration of electronic gaming of all kinds driven by the enthusiastic gamers of the south east. Over 250 arcades, pinball games, and consoles are all set to free play, no quarters needed. Founded in 2014, this year we celebrate our 5th year!

Free Play Florida is a 501c3 non-profit organization run entirely by dedicated volunteers. Every dollar from donations, sponsors, and ticket sales goes directly back into putting on the show and supporting the local gaming community.

This is the official app for Free Play Florida! It includes event schedules, a map, and a special arcade game!
